comment for fastqs: multiple (paired-end) runs from the same library, mixing multiplle libraries will not be dedupped properly
comment for unfiltered bams: 2D array of BAMS, each entry containing 5 BAMs in the order of collisions_log, mapq0, collisions, unmapped, aligned

atac.qc_report.desc: ATAC-seq on Mus musculus C57BL/6 frontal cortex adult
